description: Add input with connected button component
context:
Beads description:
Input field with a button connected/attached to it - commonly used for copy-to-clipboard patterns. The input and button should appear as a single connected unit with shared borders. Button typically on the right side. Should support light/dark themes via Graffiti theming system.

Example use cases:
- Copy URL/code snippet inputs
- Search with button
- Input with submit/action button

Reference: Common 'copy input' pattern seen in many UIs.
